thread.section_title: HelloFresh US Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of HelloFresh US | hellofresh.com | 20 of 288
thread.title: Roxanne

author: Roxanne
title: Roxanne
text: We have had a truly amazing, enjoyable time making the food. We have tried foods we have never tried before and found out we like them. We prepare and cook together which is fun, because you are not spending hours making a delicious meal. There is no last minute run to the store because you don't have what the recipe calls for to make it for dinner. Everything is included and measured. We get the five day meal plan for two, and we have found on the 2 days we don't have Hello Fresh while we're waiting for our new box of goodies we prepare some our favorites from their recipe cards. For us it is a win, win, win.
